SEARCH
Package mmmcalculator

Class CalculatorProgram

java.lang.Object
mmmcalculator.CalculatorProgram
public class CalculatorProgram extends Object
A simple calculator object which provides methods for calculating the mean, median, and mode of an array of positive integers.

    • calculateMean

      public float calculateMean(int[] numberArray)
      Returns the mean of an array of positive integers.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • calculateMedian

      public float calculateMedian(int[] numberArray)
      Returns the median of an array of positive integers.

      For arrays with odd length, returns the middle value. For arrays with even length, returns the mean of the two middle values.

      Parameters:
      numberArray - the array of positive integers to compute the median of
      Returns:
      the median of the array of integers

    • calculateMode

      public int[] calculateMode(int[] numberArray)
      Returns the mode(s) of an array of positive integers.

      If there is no mode, returns an empty list. Otherwise, returns a list of all the modes.

      Parameters:
      numberArray - the array of positive integers to compute the mode of
      Returns:
      the mode of the array of integers
